metadata.title: Copper River Basin Area 612 Soil Survey

creators.name: Palmer Field Office, U.S. Natural Resource Conservation Service formerly Soil Conservation Service

metadata.description: Data Type: Vegetation/Land Cover/Soils;  Soil survey reports and accompanying maps for areas throughout the state. Various surveys are intended to provide information relevant to development for urban use, rangeland, cropland or farming; selection of road, pond, or building sites; or value of the land as wildlife habitat. Tabular data in the reports includes soil characteristics (pH, depth, etc.), suitability and limitations of soil types, and flood hazard information. This tabular data is also available in database format.
